author: Special Correspondent
text:
Demanding punishment for those responsible for the suicide of research scholar Rohith Vemula in the University of Hyderabad, a group of students and faculty members of the Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta, have written to President Pranab Mukherjee urging him to address “discrimination and political interference in academic institutions”.

In the letter, the 60 signatories described the events that transpired in the case as “indeed tragic”, which also reflect “alleged infringement of freedom of expression, caste discrimination and partisan interference by the higher State apparatus”.
title: IIM students, faculty write to Pranab on Rohith suicide
